comp.comp-desc: A chunk of raw adobe clay, dug from the earth.
A piece of hide from one of the native Istarian animals.
Gathered from a barley plant, this grain can be used in cooking and brewing.
Berries that have been plucked from a black pepper plant.

comp.comp-desc: A red chunk of cap from the rare Blood Fungus.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This essence has a bright luminosity to it.
A chunk of cap from the Browngill Fungus.
Gathered from a carrot patch, this bright orange vegetable can be used in cooking.
This rough bark was collected from a cedar tree.
A log felled from a cedar tree that may be processed into boards for trade skills.
Sticky sap collected from a cedar tree.
A chunk of unrefined cobalt.
A chunk of unrefined copper and tin.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This essence has a dim luminosity to it.
This large chunk of earthenware clay can be used to make most any kind of pottery.
This white ovoid object, a chicken by-product, is used in cooking.
This rough bark was collected from an elm tree.
A log felled from an elm tree that may be processed into boards for trade skills.
Sticky sap collected from an elm tree.
Found occasionally in blighted resources, this crystallized black sliver seems to emanate blight.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This essence is hot as if made from pure flame.
No fish cooks better than fresh bass!
No fish cooks better than fresh bluegill!
Learn to cook, just for the halibut!
No fish cooks better than fresh mackrel.
No fish cooks better than fresh minnow.
No fish cooks better than fresh trout!
Jointed organ of the Fyakki.
This chunk has been carefully gathered from a geostone outcropping.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This essence has a glowing luminosity to it.
A chunk of unrefined gold.
Gathered from granite exposures, this material is processed for construction, and is a conduit of magic.
Ectoplasmic remains from an greater ghost
A chunk of unrefined iron.
A chunk of cap from the common Istarian Fungus.
Ectoplasmic remains from a lesser ghost
This is the severed finger from a human zombie, with the withered flesh giving off a malodorous scent. While unpleasant, many view such a finger as proof of a slain zombie of the Undead Hordes.
Strips of spongy flesh from the carcass of a maggot that met its untimely demise.
This rough bark was collected from a maple tree.
A log felled from a maple tree that may be processed into boards for trade skills.
Sticky sap collected from a maple tree.
Gathered from marble exposures, this material is processed for construction, and is a conduit of magic.
Gathered from a cow, this milk is useful in cooking, and keeping your teeth and bones strong.
A chunk of unrefined nickel.
This rough bark was collected from an oak tree.
A log felled from an oak tree that may be processed into boards for trade skills.
Sticky sap collected from an oak tree.
Gathered from obsidian exposures, this material is processed for construction, and is a conduit of magic.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This essence has a pale luminosity to it.
A chunk of unrefined platinum.
Gathered from a porcelain clay deposit, this material can be used in such things as cooking.
Gathered from a potato patch, this vegetable can be used in cooking.
Gathered from a pumpkin patch, this vegetable can be used in cooking.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills.This essence has a radiant luminosity to it.

comp.comp-desc: Raw meat gathered from a cow that met an untimely end.
Raw meat gathered from a chicken that met an untimely end.
Raw meat gathered from a dead sheep.
Raw meat gathered from a dead deer.
Gathered from a rice plant, this grain can be used in cooking and brewing.
A chunk of cap from the uncommon Roughcap Fungus.
A very large bloody heart
A common grain, usually ground and used for both breads and brewing.
A white grainy substance, useful for cooking.
Found in sand deposits, or ground from sandstone, sand is useful in creating glass products.
The sharp pincer of a sand scarab. It may be useful as a .
Gathered from sandstone exposures, this material is processed for construction, and is a conduit of magic.
A chunk of cap from the rare Shadowstem Fungus.
Magic essence that is gathered from a wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills.This essence has a shining luminosity to it.

comp.comp-desc: A chunk of unrefined silver.
Gathered from slate exposures, this material is processed for construction, and is a conduit of magic.
A soul fragment is a small portion of the physical manifestation of a departed soul, Gifted or not.
A chunk of cap from the uncommon Stonespore Fungus.
Gathered from a stoneware clay deposit, this can be used to make earthenware vessels.
Magic essence that is gathered from a slain wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This tainted essence has a bright luminosity to it.
Magic essence that is gathered from a slain wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This tainted essence has a dim luminosity to it.
Magic essence that is gathered from a slain wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This tainted essence has a glowing luminosity to it.
Magic essence that is gathered from a slain wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills. This tainted essence has a pale luminosity to it.
Magic essence that is gathered from a slain wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills.This tainted essence has a radiant luminosity to it.

comp.comp-desc: Magic essence that is gathered from a slain wisp, and later processed into orbs for use in trade skills.This tainted essence has a shining luminosity to it.

comp.comp-desc: Gathered from a deposit, this is the unprocessed form of terra cotta, used to make earthenware.
Gathered from travertine exposures, this material is processed for construction, and is a conduit of magic.
A sample of copper and tin ore for use in smithing.
A sample of sandstone for use in spellcraft and in Dragon scalecraft.
A sample of flax for use with tailoring.
Mined from an amethyst outcropping, this rock can be processed into a valuable gem.
Mined from an aquamarine outcropping, this rock can be processed into a valuable gem.

Harvested from a cerulean azulyte outcropping, this crystal can be processed into a more focused version.

Acquired from the sugar cane plant, this can be used for cooking.
Gathered from a cotton plant, this resource is processed for use in textiles.
Gathered from a flax plant, this resource is processed for use in textiles.
Gathered from a kenaf plant, this resource is processed for use in textiles.
Gathered from a silk plant or a spider, this resource is processed for use in textiles.
A resource that can be used in processes such as cooking and alchemy.
Very strong rope fibers
Ectoplasmic remains from a weaker ghost
A long bone, probably a femur, taken from a werewolf.
The enlarged heart of a werewolf, commonly used by alchemists and researchers.
Ragged strips of hide, still covered with fur, taken from the back of a werewolf.
Long strips of sinew taken from the body of a werewolf.
Gathered from a wheat plant, this grain can be used in cooking and brewing.
Ragged strips of hide, still covered with fur, taken from the back of a werewolf.
This is the incisor that has been ripped out of a wolf or a wolf-like creature. While normally worthless, some view its possession as bounty for having slain a wolf.
